ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: The study was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (81170536 and 81570056). We appreciate chenggong Li for her most dedicated help in the course of this experiment. We also sincerely acknowledge the help and guidance of Professor Ming Chen and his team, and the assistance of Jiali Wang and Jiawei Shu in R language regarding microarray analyses, meanwhile the help of pathological experts for the histological diagnosis of cervical cancer.
